customer_code: A short string that represents a customer code. (e.g. kirkoswald -> kirk)
platform_version: The release version of the Azure Data Platform. (e.g. 0.1.4)
resource_prefix: Up to 4 characters string prexix that will be used for all resource names. (e.g. kirk)
region: The Azure region where the resources will be deployed. (e.g. EastUS)
unique_id: Up to 3 characters string that will be used as a unique id for resource names that require global uniqueness.
